description: Neo-Classical head resting on PR side with cloth strips wrapped around top of nose and upper lip; open eyes; deeply crackled surface; mottled patina with greens, golds and browns; two incised/drawn mummy-like heads on back of neck; interior has deeply textured surface
image_copyright: Art © Estate Igor Mitoraj %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
marks: Signature and Date on back of neck, incised: [MITORAJ 99]
title: Eros Bendato Screpolato
